subject: Tour of California (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Of the 15 riders who began Friday at the Tour of California within a minute of Levi Leipheimer, the two-time defending champion, only two remain.
snippet: Of the 15 riders who began Friday at the Tour of California within a minute of Levi Leipheimer, the two-time defending champion, only two remain.
